title: iShares Bitcoin Trust (NASDAQ:IBIT) Shares Acquired by NTV Asset Management LLC
description: NTV Asset Management LLC increased its position in iShares Bitcoin Trust (NASDAQ:IBIT - Free Report) by 40.1% during the fourth quarter, according to the company in its most recent 13F filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). The firm owned 206,618 shares of the company's stock aft
